summary: Election officials faced unprecedented challenges in the 2020 federal election cycle. We surveyed them for their perspectives on those challenges and how they used $400 million in CARES Act funds for pandemic -related election issues. We reported on the responses we got from 43 states and a nationally representative sample of local jurisdictions. For example: Nearly all of the states reported that false or misleading...
title: 2020 Elections: State and Local Perspectives on Election Administration during the COVID-19 Pandemic
